System-Managed Reports - Claims 
bookmark_border
On this page
Daily claims (Version 1.1)
Daily claims (Version 1.0)
Monthly ad revenue audio claims summary
Monthly ad revenue audio claims

Claims reports provide a list of all claims associated to this owner and include each claim's attributes and settings.



Daily claims (Version 1.1)

This daily report lists the active, inactive, and pending claims on assets. The report includes claims on private, unlisted, and blocked videos. It also contains each claim's attributes and settings, such as applied policy, claim type, origin, and more.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_active_claims_a2.

Contents
Primary Key:
claim_id
channel_id
asset_id
video_id
reference_id
reference_video_id
claim_policy_id
asset_policy_id
custom_id

Additional fields:
claim_status
claim_status_detail
claim_origin
claim_type
uploader
channel_display_name
video_title
views
matching_duration
longest_match
content_type
claim_policy_monetize
claim_policy_track
claim_policy_block
asset_policy_monetize
asset_policy_track
asset_policy_block
claim_created_date
video_upload_date
video_duration_sec
asset_title
asset_labels
tms
director
season
episode_number
episode_title
release_date
hfa_song_code
isrc
grid
artist
album
record_label
upc
iswc
writers
is_shorts_eligible

Daily claims (Version 1.0)

This daily report lists the active, inactive, and pending claims on assets. The report includes claims on private, unlisted, and blocked videos. It also contains each claim's attributes and settings, such as applied policy, claim type, origin, and more.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_active_claims_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
claim_id
channel_id
asset_id
video_id
reference_id
reference_video_id
claim_policy_id
asset_policy_id
custom_id

Additional fields:
claim_status
claim_status_detail
claim_origin
claim_type
uploader
channel_display_name
video_title
views
matching_duration
longest_match
content_type
claim_policy_monetize
claim_policy_track
claim_policy_block
asset_policy_monetize
asset_policy_track
asset_policy_block
claim_created_date
video_upload_date
video_duration_sec
asset_title
asset_labels
tms
director
studio
season
episode_number
episode_title
release_date
hfa_song_code
isrc
grid
artist
album
record_label
upc
iswc
writers

Monthly ad revenue audio claims summary

This monthly report summarizes the audio tracks that you have claimed and the assets that they match. Although the report name does contain the word "revenue," the reports do not currently contain revenue amounts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_claim_audio_tier_revenue_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
country
start_date
end_date

Additional fields:
currency
per_play_minimum
per_play_minimum_currency
usd_local_rate
partner_playbacks
total_playbacks
audio_share
partner_audio_ad_revshare_rate
partner_audio_ad_revshare
per_play_minimum_partner_revenue
audio_royalties

Monthly ad revenue audio claims

This monthly report identifies the audio tracks that you have claimed and the assets that they match. Although the report name does contain the word "revenue," the reports do not currently contain revenue amounts.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_claim_audio_tier_revenue_raw_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
adjustment_type
country
date
video_id
asset_id
custom_id

Additional fields:
asset_title
asset_labels
isrc
upc
grid
artist
album
label
owned_views
youtube_revenue_split
partner_revenue_pro_rata
partner_revenue_per_play_min
partner_revenue
